column4: what is the preferred graphical irc client under ubuntu? after being a happy kubuntu user, I have decided to look over to gnome. Is there something more useful than gaim? I would like to have at least sound notice if someone types my nick, and be able to reopen the chat window after having it minimized to the systray
GAIM is probably the best multi-purpose chat client and it handles IRC
personally I think irssi is the best irc client evar, but it's not graphical
it handles irc, I am also able to cook an egg on my computer. Still I am not use to do so. :)
